name: Kitten Juggling
description:
It's time to do some kitten juggling (don't worry, these kittens love it)! Play the addicting game that all the kittens are talking about (seriously, they are)! Toss kittens into the air and try to see how many you can juggle for massive points and major multipliers! How many kittens are you able to juggle? To help you out, collect power-ups like Kitten Bubbles, Super Tap, and Bouncers. The more kittens you juggle, the more multipliers you can get for massive points and SCP Coin payouts. Get on the top scores list, too! If you're in the U.S., you can even play for your state in the state competition! Which state is the best?

- Juggle kittens (duh) in this addicting arcade game.
- Collect bubbles and bouncers to keep your kittens flying.
- Do not actually juggle kittens, seriously.
- Join your state's team in our 'state competition' game.
- Collect SCP Coins to use in other SCP Games!

Visit www.kittenjuggling.com for more!
